headline: Constellation Energy Stock Today: A Short Iron Condor Could Make $845 By April
summary: Why choose an energy play such as Constellation Energy stock?  Although gyrations will be common, we can anticipate the short iron condor trade in options to create opportunities for income generation.  A short iron condor consists of a short call spread and a short put spread.

headline: Vistra: Stay Long, Key Drivers Intact
summary: Vistra's recent sell-off is driven by AI/Data Center fears, but opportunities remain. Learn why VST stock is a buy, with a $175 price target and strong FCF.
